Sequence Information.Target Organism: Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli D21 (MIC=1.8 µM), Enterobacter cloacae b12 (MIC=1.0 µM), Pseudomonas aeruginosa OT97 (MIC=4.2 µM);Gram-positive bacteria:Bacillus megatherium Bm11 (MIC=3.7 µM), Bacillus subtilis Bsll (MIC=3.2 µM), Micrococcus luteus MI11 (MIC=59 µM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Comments: Induced as part of the humoral response to a bacterial invasion. Transcripts appear within one hour after injection of bacteria into the hemocoel, reach a maximum after 2-6 hours and have almost disappeared after 24 hours. Similar response is seen when flies ingest bacteria present in their food. [Ref.1]
